long/regular/late etc hours.translation[: used to say how long someone works or does things every day, or when they work or do things
work all the hours God sends (=work all the time that you can)
the long hours worked by hospital doctors
Many hospital staff have to work unsocial hours (=work in the evenings and weekends so that they cannot spend time with family or friends).
She knew that he kept late hours (=stayed up late).
